items.title: Netanyahu fires Israel's security chief over 'distrust'
items.description: The Israeli PM cited Shin Bet's failure to anticipate the 7 October attack - but the move has sparked outrage and protests.

items.title: Tesla vandals face up to 20 years in prison, says attorney general
items.description: The US attorney general said a wave of vandalism and arson attacks at Tesla dealerships is "domestic terrorism".

items.title: Trump says judge in migrant deportations case is 'Grandstander'
items.description: The judge says the government's filing in the case is "woefully insufficient", but Trump calls him a "Grandstander".

items.title: Why Elon Musk's Grok is kicking up a storm in India
items.description: The chatbot has become an "unfiltered and unhinged" digital sensation in India.

items.title: Trump signs order to begin dismantling of US education department
items.description: The move, which he promised to do on the campaign trail, is already facing legal challenges.
